Name: Shooty
About the game: Shooty 2D is a gun battle game. You can set up a room and fight with your friends. Don't be sad if you don't have friends! You can play with artificial intelligence. Gather your weapons and show your strength. Collect life packs on the maps! you'll need a lot.
